app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Tone Studio Photo Vid Editor
app_description: The Tone Studio photo and video editing app is designed to bring you all the tools you need to create beautiful content all in one easy to use app. Designed by creators for creators transform your photo and video content in seconds using our variety of editing tools including: Presets Edit in one click using our wide selection of 80 unique filters which include various styles such as film inspired moody vintage bright and colourful minimal black and white and more. Overlays Create artistic effects with a choice of over 15 unique overlays. Frames Over 30 film inspired frames. Light Leaks Get creative with our choice of 12 realistic light leaks. Adjustments Perfect your edit using our 13 professional adjustment tools including HSL shadows grain and more. Fonts and text templates 10 text templates and 37 unique fonts to add artistic titles to your content. Subscription pricing and terms Tone Studio offers two auto renewing subscription options: 4.99 USD per month or 29.99 USD per year silver subscription that unlocks all fonts presets and overlays 6.99 USD per month or 41.99 USD per year gold subscription that unlocks all fonts presets and overlays and Instagram feed planner Your Tone subscription will automatically renew 24 hours before the end of the current period. You will be charged through your iTunes account. You can turn off your subscription at any time from your iTunes account settings. You will not receive refunds for the unused portion of your term. Read our terms of use at: http: tonestudio.app terms Read our privacy policy at: http: tonestudio.app privacy Have any questions or comments Get in touch! help tonestudio.app www.tonestudio.app www.instagram.com tonestudioapp Tag your videos on Instagram with ToneStudio for a chance to be featured on our social feeds.
